ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] money problem
ygData.msgSnippet: I had someone come up to me and start begging me to summon cold stones for them. They started shouting would someone summon me a cold stone . After about 10
ygData.messageBody:
I had someone come up to me and start begging me to summon cold stones for
them. They started shouting "would someone summon me a cold stone". After
about 10 minutes I shouted back "NO."
The person sent me a tell and said "why not?" I said it was bc #1 I didn't
even know what cold stones were and #2 I didn't have a spell to summon them.
When they asked me to buy the spell I told them that my class didn't get
that spell.
Some people..
luv,
-Su

> Oh man I hadn't thought of that. That'll be a fun one when I get it lol.
My
> rogue looks somewhat like a druid and gets mistaken for one all the time.
> People ask her for Sow and I say sorry I can't and they are like why? I'm
> like I'm a rogue!
>
> Lena
>
> > Illusion Spirit Wolf is fun too. "Can you SoW me?" Then when you tell
them
> > sorry you cant you will begin to see the true colors of some people when
> > they skip asking or explaining why they thought you could and go right
to
> > cursing and spaming you. Quite funny, but can raise the old blood
pressure
> > a bit if you dont take it in stride.
> >
> > Mu
> >
>
>
>
>
>
